generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and traffic flowing on it.
- building: There are buildings visible on both sides of the road, including a large modern building on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible along the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver SUV and a black sedan.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a round "no entry" sign and a blue directional sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
